Authors:
Nicola Georgina Bergh, Vera Hoffmann, Hans Peter Linder,
George Anthony Verboom
Title:
Molecular dating of the daisy family leads to inference of
recent, rapid radiation in the Stoebe clade of paper daisies
(Asteraceae; Gnaphalieae) in the lowlands of the Cape Floristic
Region
Journal: Botanical Journal of the Linnean Society

trees.title: The Stoebe clade of paper daisies
